reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and informative. She always makes time for students' questions.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Prof. Chen's programming assignments are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her subject well, but her exams can be unpredictable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez explains complex concepts clearly. His office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's enthusiasm for chemistry is contagious. Her lab sessions are well-organized and insightful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's lectures can be dry. More interactive sessions would greatly improve the class.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's passion for literature shines through in every class. Her feedback on essays is invaluable.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor is knowledgeable, but sometimes struggles to explain complex topics to beginners.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's classes are eye-opening. She encourages critical thinking and lively discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Smith often cancels classes and seems disinterested in teaching. Very disappointing.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Her visual aids are excellent.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson poses intriguing questions, but sometimes the class discussions go off-topic.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is at the forefront of her field. Her lectures are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Davis seems biased in his teaching. More balanced viewpoints would improve the course.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson's field trips make learning come alive. Her passion for the environment is inspiring.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim knows his subject well, but his pacing can be too fast for some students.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez brings anthropology to life with her engaging stories and interactive assignments.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's real-world experience adds valuable insights to the theoretical concepts.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen's assignments are interesting, but her grading can be inconsistent at times.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. White's enthusiasm for music is infectious. His classes are a perfect blend of theory and practice.
